blockProperties.name: Capacity
blockProperties.description: Returns remaining battery capacity as an integer percentage of total capacity (with no fractional part). Requires API Level 21, Android 5, Lollipop.

blockProperties.name: ChargeCounter
blockProperties.description: Returns Battery capacity in microampere-hours, as an integer. Requires API Level 21, Android 5, Lollipop.

blockProperties.name: CurrentAvg
blockProperties.description: Returns average battery current in microamperes, as an integer. Positive values indicate net current entering the battery from a charge source, negative values indicate net current discharging from the battery. The time period over which the average is computed may depend on the fuel gauge hardware and its configuration. Requires API Level 21, Android 5, Lollipop.

blockProperties.name: CurrentNow
blockProperties.description: Returns Instantaneous battery current in microamperes, as an integer. Positive values indicate net current entering the battery from a charge source, negative values indicate net current discharging from the battery. Requires API Level 21, Android 5, Lollipop.

blockProperties.name: EnergyCounter
blockProperties.description: Returns Battery remaining energy in nanowatt-hours, as a long integer. Requires API Level 21, Android 5, Lollipop.

blockProperties.name: Health
blockProperties.description: Returns the current health constant. Possible values are: cold, dead, good, overheat, over voltage, unknown, unspecified failure.

blockProperties.name: Level
blockProperties.description: Returns the battery level. Possible values are between 0 and 100.

blockProperties.name: Plugged
blockProperties.description: Returns the battery plugged status. Possible values are: usb, ac, wireless or unknown.

blockProperties.name: Status
blockProperties.description: Returns the battery status. Possible values are: charging, full, discharging, not charging or unknown.

blockProperties.name: Temperature
blockProperties.description: Returns the battery temperature in celcius.

blockProperties.name: Voltage
blockProperties.description: Returns the battery voltage level in millivolts.

name: TaifunBattery
helpString: Battery Manager extension. Version 2 as of 2019-03-11 for App Inventor version nb175 and Companion version 2.51.
